about: With over 8 years of dedicated experience in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), I possess the expertise to significantly enhance your team's success. Excel in solving urgent issues and maintain a strong aptitude for meticulous issue tracking. My expertise encompasses critical areas such as software design, architecture, and planning for noteworthy projects including Onepay, uabpay, Abank Internet banking, and A+ 2.0. My profound knowledge extends to API gateway and FinTech, enabling me to navigate these complex domains effectively. I am adept at seamless communication with various business departments and product owners, and I have a proven track record in managing vendors and ensuring impeccable source code control. I stand ready to be your asset in delivering excellence.
